Target.Builder(android.support.v7.graphi.Description: Create a new builder based on an existing @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Target_E@.

Parameters: boolean: true if any the color is exclusive to this target, or false is the color can be selected for other targets.
setExclusive(boolean).Description: Set whether any color selected for this target is exclusive to this target only. Defaults to true.

Parameters: float no parameter comment Value is between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive.
setMinimumLightness(float).Description: Set the minimum lightness value for this target.

Parameters: float no parameter comment Value is 0.0 or greater.
setSaturationWeight(float).Description: Set the weight of importance that this target will place on saturation values. The larger the weight, relative to the other weights, the more important that a color being close to the target value has on selection. A weight of 0 means that it has no weight, and thus has no bearing on the selection.

Parameters: float no parameter comment Value is 0.0 or greater.
setPopulationWeight(float).Description: Set the weight of importance that this target will place on a color's population within the image. The larger the weight, relative to the other weights, the more important that a color's population being close to the most populous has on selection. A weight of 0 means that it has no weight, and thus has no bearing on the selection.

Parameters: float no parameter comment Value is 0.0 or greater.
setLightnessWeight(float).Description: Set the weight of importance that this target will place on lightness values. The larger the weight, relative to the other weights, the more important that a color being close to the target value has on selection. A weight of 0 means that it has no weight, and thus has no bearing on the selection.
